Name: Pulverizer
Description: Crushing 5 ores will net you two pulverized powder, can only be used in Electric Furnaces.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 粉碎5个矿石可获得2份矿粉，矿粉只能用于电炉。
DescriptionLocalization.de: Wenn man 5x Erz hineinlegt, erhaltet man 2x Pulver, welches nur in Elektro-Öfen verwendet werden kann.
